1.0.name: wordpress/youtube-upload-widget
1.0.description:
The YouTube Upload Widget adds video to your blogpost! You can now create a video through your webcam, upload it directly to your own YouTube channel, and share it in your post without ever leaving Wordpress. All the work is done securely through the YouTube APIs.
